displayName: VM Instance - High GPU Memory Utilization

documentation.content: This alert fires when the GPU memory utilization on any VM instance in the project rises above 90% for 5 minutes or more.

conditions.displayName: VM Instance - High GPU memory utilization

conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query:
{ fetch gce_instance
  | metric 'agent.googleapis.com/gpu/memory/bytes_used'
  | filter metric.memory_state == 'used'
  | group_by 5m, [value_bytes_used_mean: mean(value.bytes_used)]
  | every 5m
  | group_by [metric.gpu_number, metric.model, metric.uuid, resource.instance_id, resource.project_id, resource.zone, metadata.system_labels.name], [value_bytes_used_mean_aggregate: aggregate(value_bytes_used_mean)]
; fetch gce_instance
  | metric 'agent.googleapis.com/gpu/memory/bytes_used' 
  | group_by 5m, [value_bytes_used_mean: mean(value.bytes_used)]
  | every 5m
  | group_by [metric.gpu_number, metric.model, metric.uuid, resource.instance_id, resource.project_id, resource.zone, metadata.system_labels.name], [value_bytes_used_mean_aggregate: aggregate(value_bytes_used_mean)] }
| ratio
| mul (100)
| cast_units ('%')
| every 5m
| condition val() > 0.9 '10^2.%'
